channel.title: spanbert on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in spanbert on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: [논문리뷰] SpanBERT: Improving Pre-training by Representing and Predicting Spans
item.description: Abstract text의 span을 잘 표현하고 예측하는 pre-training 방법인 SpanBERT를 제안 random token이 아닌 contiguous random span을 masking 개별 token representations
